attributes.title: Employee Well-being Feedback Form
attributes.description: We value your feedback on how we can improve the well-being of our employees. Please take a few minutes to fill out this form.

questions.question: How would you rate the level of support provided by the HR team?
Do you feel comfortable discussing personal issues with your manager?
How satisfied are you with the work-life balance at our company?

attributes.customTextField: Is there anything else you would like to share about employee well-being at our company?
